#summary Sample YADFC XML File for a Double Fanucci Deck.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Support,Featured

= Introduction =

The following is an example of an XML file for use with the command-line interface of YADFC.

{{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<cards>
	<card suit="Bugs" value="Naught" />
	<card suit="Bugs" value="1" />
	<card suit="Bugs" value="2" />
	<card suit="Bugs" value="3" />
	<card suit="Bugs" value="4" />

    <card suit="Mazes" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Mazes" value="1" />
    <card suit="Mazes" value="2" />
    <card suit="Mazes" value="3" />

    <card suit="Fromps" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Fromps" value="1" />

    <card suit="Inkblots" value="Naught" />

    <card suit="Ears" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Ears" value="1" />
    <card suit="Ears" value="2" />

    <card suit="Time" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Time" value="1" />
    <card suit="Time" value="2" />
    <card suit="Time" value="3" />

    <card suit="Zurfs" value="Naught" />
    
    <card suit="Books" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Books" value="1" />
    
    <card suit="Plungers" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Plungers" value="1" />

    <card suit="Tops" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Tops" value="1" />
    <card suit="Tops" value="2" />
    <card suit="Tops" value="3" />

    <card suit="Rain" value="Naught" />
    <card suit="Rain" value="1" />
    
    <card suit="Faces" value="Naught" />
</cards>
}}}
